title: Auction for Sale (Re-Issue) of Government Stocks (Ministry of Finance of the Republic of India) ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Finance of the Republic of India ) The Government of India have announced the Sale (re-issue/issue) of (i) '7.68 per cent Government Stock 2023' for a notified amount of Rs. 2, 000 crore (nominal) through price based
